comment: Dr. Sun is a very nice and passionate professor. Her lectures are informative and her grading system is very fair. There are 2 exams, a few class assignments and discussions, and a group project. She lets you make up misses work with a small penalty. The only hard part are the 2 exams, which are open book, as she expects well crafted answers.

She's a pretty good professor, the lectures aren't hard and everything is posted online to check later. Barely any assignments, and she is a very generous grader. Gives good study guides for finals, but doesn't give much time for the major group project towards the end of the semester.

You can pass her class only if u go to class and do all the discussions. Shes not a hard teacher the class is easy but she asks for a note to be excused if you are not present but will still deduct it from your grade for attendance

I love her. She's so sweet and genuinely cares. It is a very easy class. It's lecture heavy but tests are open note and fairly simple with no lockdown browser. She is very understanding and truly wants everyone to pass. Slight accent but nothing terrible, you can still understand her pretty clearly. I'd 100% take her again!
